title: The Best Tech of IFA 2022: LG OLED Flex, Honor 70 and more

media:group.media:title: The Best Tech of IFA 2022: LG OLED Flex, Honor 70 and more
media:group.media:description:
The TechRadar team has spent the last few days wearing away the soles of our feet by trekking around the halls of IFA 2022, looking for the smartest, most innovative and highest quality new tech releases.

The big IFA tech show is full of all kinds of creations, from weird new crowdfunded ideas to huge releases from the biggest companies, all under one roof. Well, several roofs really. It's a very big show.

After looking over as much of it as possible, the TechRadar team got together and chose our favorite products from IFA in 10 categories, and that's what you'll find here â€“ the tech we're most excited by, and that we think you need to hear about.

#Techradar #IFA #ifa2022 #LG #tech #technology
